## isArray() function

检查值value是否为array

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isArray(value: any): value is Array<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is Array&lt;any&gt;

如果value等于Array类型,那么返回true,否则返回false
